page.title: 10CULLOMPTON FIRE SERVICE
page.content: Firemen do not work shifts here but are on call 24 hours a day.They are told by bleeper when there is a fire.At least four must attend a fire and six can travel on the fire_engine. They wear helmets, leggings,tunics and boots.The fire engine is 26'long 9'9"high and 7'6"wide.It carries 215 different pieces of equipment and 400 gallons of water. They are called mainly to chimney fires in the winter and barn fires in the summer.They attend approx.190 fires a year,more in a dry summer in Cullompton and surrounding area.They also rescue animals,attend car accidents and go to floods. They hope to get a new engine in the future.
